及.definition: and; to reach; up to; in time for

及其.definition: (conjunction linking two nouns) and its ...; and their ...; and his ...; and her ...

及早.definition: at the earliest possible time; as soon as possible

及時.definition: timely; at the right time; promptly; without delay

及時行樂.definition: to enjoy the present (idiom); to live happily with no thought for the future; make merry while you can; carpe diem

及時雨.definition: timely rain; (fig.) timely assistance; timely help

及格.definition: to pass an exam or a test; to meet a minimum standard

及格線.definition: passing line or score (in an examination)

及笄.definition: to reach marriageable age (a girl's fifteenth birthday)

及鋒而試.definition: lit. to reach the tip and try (idiom); to have a go when at one's peak
